data.text:
2022 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

Steve Simoneau

44 Diego Davis

Position Linebacker

Ht./Wt. 5-11 / 233

Class Freshman

Hometown Napa, CA

High School Vintage

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2022 Season

Saw action in 9 games

Recorded 2 tackles and assisted on 4

High School

Played for coach Dylan Leach at Vintage HS where he was also a member of the baseball and track teams

Was a first team All-League selection at both linebacker and running back

Was selected as the VVAL Defensive Player of the Year

Was the Tri-County All-Star game Defensive MVP and was also the Rival Game Series MVP

Was named the Napa County Defensive Player of the Year

Had 47 rush attempts for 581 yards and 10 touchdowns as a senior while also recording nine receptions for 118 yards and three scores

Led his team with 81 tackles in nine games, including five tackles for loss

Had two interceptions with 110 yards in returns, one for a touchdown

Was also credited with four pass breakups and three forced fumbles

Helped his team to a pair of league titles with a 27-4-1 record overall

Was named to the academic honor roll four times

Personal Information

Full name is Diego A. Davis

Was born on March 29, 2004, in Vallejo, Calif.

Is the son of Ryan Troup and Melanie Davis

Has three sisters â€“ Ashanti, Raquel and Vivien

His uncle Andre Hardy as well as his cousin Andre Hardy, Jr., both played in the NFL

Chose Stetson over San Diego State, San Jose State and UC Davis

Is a double-major in Business and Health Science
